long_description:
Looking for a truly unique wine tasting experience during your visit to The Wine Country Inn? The Napa Valley Wine Trolley offers a tour and tasting experience on-the-go that you won’t soon forget. Hop aboard one of the hand-built replicas of a California street cable car, settling in for a fun ride. From the all-wooden carriage to the brass bell, this authentic Napa Valley trolley offers passage between some of the area’s best wineries. You’ll even receive a free picnic lunch along with your trolley tour! Discover more about this unique feature offered in Napa Valley.

For more information on unique wine tastings in Napa Valley, read about our local partners. Some truly world-class wineries await your visit here in gorgeous Wine Country!

A Classic Tour on the Napa Valley Wine Trolley

You’ll love experiencing Wine Country with the classic trolley tour. This 6-hour adventure is simply the best way to see the region while tasting world-class wines in the process. The open-air Napa Valley Wine Trolley will take you through the towns of Napa, Yountville, Oakville, and Rutherford. You’ll make a stop at four wineries along the way; these vary depending on the day of the week. This means you can go every day of the week and experience entirely new wineries! Beginning at the Oxbow Market and ending in downtown Napa, the classic tour includes a catered picnic lunch. Enjoy your scenic meal in a wine cave or outside in the gardens alongside the vineyards. You’ll feel the cool winds and warm sun as you ride through beautiful Napa Valley en route to delicious wine!

Participating Napa Valley Wineries

Napa Valley is home to over 450 wineries in just a 30-mile span. When you take a ride on the Napa Valley Wine Trolley, you will get to discover the best! Participating wineries include Castello di Amorosa, an authentically-styled 13th-century Tuscan castle. Others are the Monticello Vineyards with Burgundian-style wines and the V. Sattui Winery in St. Helena with one of the grandest tasting rooms around. You’ll also have the chance to visit Twomey Cellars, which features a rich history of 40 years of winemaking. The Chase Family Cellars is another popular St. Helena winery participating with a famous Zinfandel Rose! Discover even more beautiful vineyards and wineries as you travel the route of the Napa Valley Wine Trolley.

After a Trolley Tour, Retreat to The Wine Country Inn

After enjoying some tasty wines at four different wineries, retreat to The Wine Country Inn for peaceful vineyard and mountain views. You’ll love a serene evening after a long day of touring and tasting. Settle into your cottage or suite for a relaxing evening and enjoy top-tier amenities. From luxurious king sized beds with high-quality bedding to spacious bathrooms with soaking tubs, you’ll have plenty of space to revamp and rejuvenate. Cuddle up by the fireplace or enjoy the sprawling landscape from your private patio. Is this what vacation feels like? You’ll truly be right at home at The Wine Country Inn!
